Stats over 999
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Stats over 999
By Rahu on Monday, August 30, 2010 - 09:56 pm:

Is this possible? I just beat the S Rank official and saw a dragon there with 1100 some odd power (fortunately it's others scores are pretty poor!). Then there was that whole buisness with the 4 Heavenly Kings. I went to the Naga Cup, but the Nagas there are all breaking the 999 limit too. I just cant figure out how to beat them when I am bound by a limitation they do not have.

Also, are there really going to be no items at the shop and no sales at the guide until I win one of these tournements? Because my Dragon is pretty old, I dont think he will make it.

By Damion Cross on Monday, August 30, 2010 - 10:06 pm:

yeah after awhile you'll unlock the icicle tournament which unlocks slates, which unlocks overdrive (1500 max for ea stat)

there are also 6 requirements, and if you fill four different ones when combining to create a monster with overdrive....

1. parent has overdrive

2. parent has a total of 4800 stats

3. parent has 80% win rate

4. parent has 50 wi fi battles

5. parent has beaten a zodiac monster

6. parent has reached sss rank

so theoretically can get it before slates are unlocked

By Rahu on Tuesday, August 31, 2010 - 07:30 am:

after awhile? I'm like 30 years in, what do I have to do?

By Thorr on Wednesday, September 1, 2010 - 07:59 am:

Battle Royale Series was offered to me after I achieved Breeder Rank S. I was on my third monster and was doing some class E tournaments when the president came and told me about the Icicle Festival (Class A tournament). Win that tournament and you open up the Battle Royal Series where you can battle for Slate Frags.

By Rahu on Wednesday, September 1, 2010 - 08:01 am:

Okay. I remember when she did that now. What month is the Icicle Festival held?

By Damion Cross on Wednesday, September 1, 2010 - 10:13 am:

i forget - it's an "A" rank tourney

By Thorr on Monday, September 13, 2010 - 08:30 am:

I found the blurb in the Perfect Guide about the Icicle Fest.

It appears to say the following -

1) do 6 of something. The kanji is very thick in this sentence and I don't know what it says.

2) Be on the farm on month 9, week 2 for the invitation to Icicle Fest

3) Icicle Fest is on 12-2. Class A.

4) Win to unlock the Battle Royal Series.

By Thorr on Monday, September 13, 2010 - 08:55 am:

Figured it out -

1) Raise at least 6 different breeds of monster.

By Rahu on Monday, September 13, 2010 - 12:45 pm:

Thanks for the info.

So once I beat this, my calender will be peppered with just a whole bunch of new tournements every year?
